name: Formico – Elementor Form Fields and Extensions
author: KaisarAhmmed

sections.description:
The easiest and lightweight elementor pro form extensions bundle. Take your Elementor form building capabilities to the next level with our Form Extensions plugin!
After install, you will see a menu in admin dashboard called Formico. Click it, and active your elementor form extension and fields to use in elmentor form.

Form Field Extensions

  • Input Mask
  • Address Auto Complete

Form Fields

  • Samrt Phone Field
  • Range Slider Field

Google Map API for address auto complete.

To use the address auto-complete extension, a Google Maps API key is required. If an API key is not added in the Formico settings, the address auto-complete options will be hidden. Here are some useful links about obtaining a Google Maps API key:

Youtube Video

Get Google API Key

Requirements

  • PHP 5.6
  • Elementor Pro
sections.installation:
1. Install Formico plugin
  2. Make sure you also have Elementor Pro activated.
